src:
Details of former 'Isibaya' actor Andile Gumbi's memorial released

05 Nov 2019, 11:11

Phakamani Mvelashe
Cape Town - Details of former Isibaya actor Andile Gumbi’s memorial have finally been released.
His memorial service will take place at Assemblies of God church in Sandton, north of Johannesburg on Wednesday from 14:00.






The actor, who is best known for his role as Zweli Ngubane on Isibaya, lost his life after suffering a heart attack.
He was admitted at the Shaare Zedek Medical Centre in Israel, Jerusalem where he fought for his life in ICU.



Even though the details have not been confirmed, Move! has learnt that his funeral will be on Saturday in Durban.
The family representatives will issue more details after the memorial service.

Related Links
